.. _Contributing:
Contributing
=============

Contributions are welcome! Presamples is true open source software - our code and development process is as open as we can make it.

To contribute code, please follow the standard `Github workflow <https://guides.github.com/introduction/flow/>`__.
Make sure to add tests for any contribution you make.

Once your contribution has been merged, add yourself to the authors list on this page.

Authors
=======
The core Presamples team is Pascal Lesage from `CIRAIG <http://www.ciraig.org/en/>`__ and Chris Mutel from `PSI <https://www.psi.ch/en>`__.
